name: Sencha+Phonegap introduction
body:
### Sencha+Phonegap introduction.
This is a talk given for the Paris Android user Group and the first Paris Phonegap meetup.

## Best of both worlds
Sencha Touch is an awesome framework for mobile web apps.
Combined with Phonegap, it allows to access devices apis and publish web apps to the store.
tagline: sencha/phonegap talk for Paris Android User Group and Phonegap Paris meetup
